commit message:
Fixed bug on causing crash when choosing percentage on Android 4+
Add a xhdpi icon
Support f**ck**g formatting of pref summary since Gingerbread
Level is now a Maven project
Calculation of the orientation with the accelerometer now use the magnetic field properly.
Generates PNG application icons for every density from a single SVG file
use the androidgendrawable plugin to generate the the Play store high res icon

Found the portrait mode right formula
Remove deprecated Orientation Sensor and use ROTATION_VECTOR instead

Add signing & proguard
Update licence description
Clean code
